examples: to suck the juice from an orange
chupar el jugo de una naranja
She was noisily sucking up milk through a straw.
Chupaba leche ruidosamente con una pajita.
He sucked the blood from a cut on his finger.
Chupó la sangre de un corte en su dedo.
The baby sucked at its mother's breast.
El bebé chupó del pecho de su madre.
